Articles.Content:
Just a simple 3.75 meter service bay like the rest.

I don't want tweakscale, the texture should be different and 1.25 and 2.5 are not identical.

I want the bay to be empty like the others unlike Near Future service bays.

Rescale them ?

EDIT- Or Cargo Transportation [http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/77505-Cargo-Transportation-Solutions-%28WIP%29](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/77505-Cargo-Transportation-Solutions-%28WIP%29)

EDIT- You use ModuleManager.\*.\*.\* ?

**Edited <time datetime="2015-05-16T21:45:06Z" title="05/16/2015 09:45  PM" data-short="9 yr">May 16, 2015</time> by Mecripp2**

Read the post. I don't want tweakscale as I have issues with the textures and generally don't like it. 

And I want them to be just like the smaller ones in form, so no to Cargo Transportation.
If they make one, maybe it can be less ugly than the stock ones ![;)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_wink.gif)

> 
> Read the post. I don't want tweakscale as I have issues with the textures and generally don't like it. 
> And I want them to be just like the smaller ones in form, so no to Cargo Transportation.

I did read the post you don't have to have tweakscale to rescale ![:confused:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_huh.gif)

EDIT- Try this and call me in the morning lol [https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/72893034/help/3mServiceBay.cfg](https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/72893034/help/3mServiceBay.cfg)

EDIT- With out tweakscale just the power of MM ![screenshot8.png](https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/72893034/UFO/screenshot8.png)

EDIT- What you want the other color ?

**Edited <time datetime="2015-05-16T22:03:20Z" title="05/16/2015 10:03  PM" data-short="9 yr">May 16, 2015</time> by Mecripp2**
Awesome. I think red will do for the color. The same red the Kerbal flag uses.
LoL I got the red just alittle trouble getting it to show up ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)
Do your best, as long as it isn't the same color as the others and looks good.
Lol it's getting the best of me it just shows all white in game puzzled but here, Is what it looks like ![ServiceBay3.png](https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/72893034/UFO/ServiceBay3.png)
Looks good. The all white is a texture issue from what I know from modding.
I'll keep playing around with it and when, I get it, I'll let you know lol.

You don't need the patch now just unzip and copy to your KSP/GameData folder [https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/72893034/help/ServiceBay3M.zip](https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/72893034/help/ServiceBay3M.zip)

EDIT- ![screenshot9.png](https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/72893034/UFO/screenshot9.png)
